detaileddescription.para: Configures ADC with VCC reference, 125kHz clock, and enables ADC subsystem. Sets up all power monitoring channels for sonicator interfaces.

simplesect.para: ADC_OK on success, error code on failure
ADC_OK on success, error code on failure
ADC_OK on success, error code on failure
ADC clock should be 50-200kHz for optimal accuracy

ADC_OK on success, error code on failure

briefdescription.para: Check if ADC conversion is complete.

simplesect.para: ADC_OK on success, error code on failure
ADC_OK on success, error code on failure
Only call after adc_conversion_complete() returns true

briefdescription.para: Convert raw ADC value to voltage.

simplesect.para: ADC_OK on success, error code on failure

briefdescription.para: Convert raw ADC value to power (watts)

detaileddescription.para: Applies sonicator power scaling: 5.44mV/W with voltage divider

parameterdescription.para: Raw ADC reading from power monitoring channel
Pointer to store power result in watts

simplesect.para: ADC_OK on success, error code on failure

briefdescription.para: Convert raw ADC value to frequency (Hz)

detaileddescription.para: Applies LM2907 frequency converter scaling for channel 0

parameterdescription.para: Raw ADC reading from frequency channel
Pointer to store frequency result in Hz

simplesect.para: ADC_OK on success, error code on failure

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to store power in watts

ADC_OK on success, error code on failure

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to store frequency in Hz

briefdescription.para: Calibrate ADC with known reference voltage.

briefdescription.para: ADC Hardware Abstraction Layer Implementation for ATmega32A.
